description: The Ibiza hatchback and Arona crossover get upgrades in both performance and equipment levels. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Car review: How the Seat Ibiza and Arona measure up
title_page: Car review: How the Seat Ibiza and Arona measure up | The Straits Times
maintext:
SINGAPORE - When Spanish carmaker Seat returned to Singapore in 2016, its agent Vertex Euro Motors introduced a hotchpotch line-up that included the stomping Leon Cupra hot hatch and ageing turbodiesel Toledo sedan.
The Leon Cupra swiftly gained a reputation for being a credible rival to the Volkswagen (VW) Golf GTI, while the Toledo found favour among private-hire drivers.
